channel.title: Vipscape slow training I want kind of fast xp
channel.description:
Hi I no theres away to change the ammount of xp given for killing something atm its
1hit = 40xp something like that I want
1hit = 1500xp im not sure how to change it though does anyone know???

item.title: Vipscape slow training I want kind of fast xp
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Go to your client.java. Hit CTRL+F

Search for: inCombat();

And change the numbers like for yours it would say around 1500 * hitdiff
Change the 1500 to whatever you want.
Do it for all the hitdiffâ€™s below as well.

Read full topic
